attributes.comment:
I do not mind the fee increase, this is America. You pay what you get. However, I
also believe, the more we pay, the better services should provide!, for example,
USCIS has a premium services for I-140, I paid that and got approved response
very quick, I like it, b/s I pay more and deserve it, now I want the same service
apply to I-485, rather than endless waiting either from USCIS or FBI's name check,
I know the security is very important to this country, however, if you use the
money to streamline and speed up the process, and deliver the result promptly, I
think people will understand and accept the fee increase, but if USCIS keep fee
increase but do nothing about I-485 process, just ask them how many people are
backlog due to visa number or FBI name check... come on,

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
